entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
